instructions: Open Mail and go to the Mailboxes screen. If the list of emails displays, tap Mailboxes at the top. In the list of email folders, tap VIP , or choose the (i) button if one or more VIP senders is set up. Choose Add VIP . Search and select a contact. The contact must have an email address. If the contact only has a phone number, they can't be added to the VIP list. The new VIP contact appears in the list.
